editorial.statement: I build the web with curiosity and intention.
editorial.projects_intro: Each project shaped how I approach problems.
editorial.journey_intro: Roles that taught me how to build and collaborate.

data.ewastepas_desc: A web application for electronic waste management. Focused on responsive design and user experience.
data.babygrowth_desc: Cloud-based health tracking application. National-scale project recognized among top 50 capstone projects.
data.exp_gdc_desc: Developed cloud computing learning materials. Mentored in technical workshops and project-based programs.
data.exp_bangkit_desc: Built cloud-based applications in cross-functional teams. Project recognized as Top 50 among 200+ teams nationwide.
data.exp_granesia_desc: Developed company profile website. Ensured responsive design and cross-device compatibility.
